name: Bedtime Story
description: This is BEDTIME STORY, a short Bitsy story designed to help you sleep. Things will get stranger and stranger and more and more dreamlike. There will be fun, pocket-sized worlds to navigate and strange creatures to talk to. The game's colours will progressively shift from cooler tones to warmer tones then to darkness. You will say goodnight to everything in your world. And you will find yourself in a dark, quiet, safe mindset where you can shut your laptop and go to sleep.
